results.definition: an open recess in a wall at the base of a chimney where a fire can be built
examples: he laid a fire in the hearth and lit it
the hearth was black with the charcoal of many fires

results.definition: home symbolized as a part of the fireplace
an area near a fireplace (usually paved and extending out into a room)
examples: they sat on the hearth and warmed themselves before the fire
